Browse the source code of netbsd/sys/external/bsd/drm2/dist/drm/nouveau/nvkm/engine/gr/nouveau_nvkm_engine_gr_nv20.c

1/* $NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_engine_gr_nv20.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:32 riastradh Exp $ */
2
3#include <sys/cdefs.h>
4__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_engine_gr_nv20.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:32 riastradh Exp $");
5
6#include "nv20.h"
7#include "regs.h"
8
9#include <core/client.h>
10#include <core/gpuobj.h>
11#include <engine/fifo.h>
12#include <engine/fifo/chan.h>
13#include <subdev/fb.h>
14#include <subdev/timer.h>
15
16/*******************************************************************************
17 * PGRAPH context
18 ******************************************************************************/
19
20int
21nv20_gr_chan_init(struct nvkm_object *object)
22{
23 struct nv20_gr_chan *chan = nv20_gr_chan(object);
24 struct nv20_gr *gr = chan->gr;
25 u32 inst = nvkm_memory_addr(chan->inst);
26
27 nvkm_kmap(gr->ctxtab);
28 nvkm_wo32(gr->ctxtab, chan->chid * 4, inst >> 4);
29 nvkm_done(gr->ctxtab);
30 return 0;
31}
32
33int
34nv20_gr_chan_fini(struct nvkm_object *object, bool suspend)
35{
36 struct nv20_gr_chan *chan = nv20_gr_chan(object);
37 struct nv20_gr *gr = chan->gr;
38 struct nvkm_device *device = gr->base.engine.subdev.device;
39 u32 inst = nvkm_memory_addr(chan->inst);
40 int chid = -1;
41
42 nvkm_mask(device, 0x400720, 0x00000001, 0x00000000);
43 if (nvkm_rd32(device, 0x400144) & 0x00010000)
44 chid = (nvkm_rd32(device, 0x400148) & 0x1f000000) >> 24;
45 if (chan->chid == chid) {
46 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x400784, inst >> 4);
47 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x400788, 0x00000002);
48 nvkm_msec(device, 2000,
49 if (!nvkm_rd32(device, 0x400700))
50 break;
51 );
52 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x400144, 0x10000000);
53 nvkm_mask(device, 0x400148, 0xff000000, 0x1f000000);
54 }
55 nvkm_mask(device, 0x400720, 0x00000001, 0x00000001);
56
57 nvkm_kmap(gr->ctxtab);
58 nvkm_wo32(gr->ctxtab, chan->chid * 4, 0x00000000);
59 nvkm_done(gr->ctxtab);
60 return 0;
61}
62
63void *
64nv20_gr_chan_dtor(struct nvkm_object *object)
65{
66 struct nv20_gr_chan *chan = nv20_gr_chan(object);
67 nvkm_memory_del(&chan->inst);
68 return chan;
69}
70
71static const struct nvkm_object_func
72nv20_gr_chan = {
73 .dtor = nv20_gr_chan_dtor,
74 .init = nv20_gr_chan_init,
75 .fini = nv20_gr_chan_fini,
76};
77
78static int
79nv20_gr_chan_new(struct nvkm_gr *base, struct nvkm_fifo_chan *fifoch,
80 const struct nvkm_oclass *oclass, struct nvkm_object **pobject)
81{
82 struct nv20_gr *gr = nv20_gr(base);
83 struct nv20_gr_chan *chan;
84 int ret, i;
85
86 if (!(chan = kzalloc(sizeof(*chan), GFP_KERNEL)))
87 return -ENOMEM;
88 nvkm_object_ctor(&nv20_gr_chan, oclass, &chan->object);
89 chan->gr = gr;
90 chan->chid = fifoch->chid;
91 *pobject = &chan->object;
92
93 ret = nvkm_memory_new(gr->base.engine.subdev.device,
94 NVKM_MEM_TARGET_INST, 0x37f0, 16, true,
95 &chan->inst);
96 if (ret)
97 return ret;
98
99 nvkm_kmap(chan->inst);
100 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x0000, 0x00000001 | (chan->chid << 24));
101 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x033c, 0xffff0000);
102 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x03a0, 0x0fff0000);
103 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x03a4, 0x0fff0000);
104 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x047c, 0x00000101);
105 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x0490, 0x00000111);
106 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x04a8, 0x44400000);
107 for (i = 0x04d4; i <= 0x04e0; i += 4)
108 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, i, 0x00030303);
109 for (i = 0x04f4; i <= 0x0500; i += 4)
110 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, i, 0x00080000);
111 for (i = 0x050c; i <= 0x0518; i += 4)
112 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, i, 0x01012000);
113 for (i = 0x051c; i <= 0x0528; i += 4)
114 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, i, 0x000105b8);
115 for (i = 0x052c; i <= 0x0538; i += 4)
116 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, i, 0x00080008);
117 for (i = 0x055c; i <= 0x0598; i += 4)
118 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, i, 0x07ff0000);
119 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x05a4, 0x4b7fffff);
120 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x05fc, 0x00000001);
121 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x0604, 0x00004000);
122 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x0610, 0x00000001);
123 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x0618, 0x00040000);
124 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x061c, 0x00010000);
125 for (i = 0x1c1c; i <= 0x248c; i += 16) {
126 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, (i + 0), 0x10700ff9);
127 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, (i + 4), 0x0436086c);
128 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, (i + 8), 0x000c001b);
129 }
130 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x281c, 0x3f800000);
131 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x2830, 0x3f800000);
132 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x285c, 0x40000000);
133 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x2860, 0x3f800000);
134 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x2864, 0x3f000000);
135 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x286c, 0x40000000);
136 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x2870, 0x3f800000);
137 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x2878, 0xbf800000);
138 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x2880, 0xbf800000);
139 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x34a4, 0x000fe000);
140 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x3530, 0x000003f8);
141 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, 0x3540, 0x002fe000);
142 for (i = 0x355c; i <= 0x3578; i += 4)
143 nvkm_wo32(chan->inst, i, 0x001c527c);
144 nvkm_done(chan->inst);
145 return 0;
146}
147
148/*******************************************************************************
149 * PGRAPH engine/subdev functions
150 ******************************************************************************/
151
152void
153nv20_gr_tile(struct nvkm_gr *base, int i, struct nvkm_fb_tile *tile)
154{
155 struct nv20_gr *gr = nv20_gr(base);
156 struct nvkm_device *device = gr->base.engine.subdev.device;
157 struct nvkm_fifo *fifo = device->fifo;
158 unsigned long flags;
159
160 nvkm_fifo_pause(fifo, &flags);
161 nv04_gr_idle(&gr->base);
162
163 nvkm_wr32(device, NV20_PGRAPH_TLIMIT(i), tile->limit);
164 nvkm_wr32(device, NV20_PGRAPH_TSIZE(i), tile->pitch);
165 nvkm_wr32(device, NV20_PGRAPH_TILE(i), tile->addr);
166
167 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_INDEX, 0x00EA0030 + 4 * i);
168 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_DATA, tile->limit);
169 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_INDEX, 0x00EA0050 + 4 * i);
170 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_DATA, tile->pitch);
171 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_INDEX, 0x00EA0010 + 4 * i);
172 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_DATA, tile->addr);
173
174 if (device->chipset != 0x34) {
175 nvkm_wr32(device, NV20_PGRAPH_ZCOMP(i), tile->zcomp);
176 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_INDEX, 0x00ea0090 + 4 * i);
177 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_DATA, tile->zcomp);
178 }
179
180 nvkm_fifo_start(fifo, &flags);
181}
182
183void
184nv20_gr_intr(struct nvkm_gr *base)
185{
186 struct nv20_gr *gr = nv20_gr(base);
187 struct nvkm_subdev *subdev = &gr->base.engine.subdev;
188 struct nvkm_device *device = subdev->device;
189 struct nvkm_fifo_chan *chan;
190 u32 stat = nvkm_rd32(device, NV03_PGRAPH_INTR);
191 u32 nsource = nvkm_rd32(device, NV03_PGRAPH_NSOURCE);
192 u32 nstatus = nvkm_rd32(device, NV03_PGRAPH_NSTATUS);
193 u32 addr = nvkm_rd32(device, NV04_PGRAPH_TRAPPED_ADDR);
194 u32 chid = (addr & 0x01f00000) >> 20;
195 u32 subc = (addr & 0x00070000) >> 16;
196 u32 mthd = (addr & 0x00001ffc);
197 u32 data = nvkm_rd32(device, NV04_PGRAPH_TRAPPED_DATA);
198 u32 class = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x400160 + subc * 4) & 0xfff;
199 u32 show = stat;
200 char msg[128], src[128], sta[128];
201 unsigned long flags;
202
203 chan = nvkm_fifo_chan_chid(device->fifo, chid, &flags);
204
205 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PGRAPH_INTR, stat);
206 nvkm_wr32(device, NV04_PGRAPH_FIFO, 0x00000001);
207
208 if (show) {
209 nvkm_snprintbf(msg, sizeof(msg), nv10_gr_intr_name, show);
210 nvkm_snprintbf(src, sizeof(src), nv04_gr_nsource, nsource);
211 nvkm_snprintbf(sta, sizeof(sta), nv10_gr_nstatus, nstatus);
212 nvkm_error(subdev, "intr %08x [%s] nsource %08x [%s] "
213 "nstatus %08x [%s] ch %d [%s] subc %d "
214 "class %04x mthd %04x data %08x\n",
215 show, msg, nsource, src, nstatus, sta, chid,
216 chan ? chan->object.client->name : "unknown",
217 subc, class, mthd, data);
218 }
219
220 nvkm_fifo_chan_put(device->fifo, flags, &chan);
221}
222
223int
224nv20_gr_oneinit(struct nvkm_gr *base)
225{
226 struct nv20_gr *gr = nv20_gr(base);
227 return nvkm_memory_new(gr->base.engine.subdev.device,
228 NVKM_MEM_TARGET_INST, 32 * 4, 16,
229 true, &gr->ctxtab);
230}
231
232int
233nv20_gr_init(struct nvkm_gr *base)
234{
235 struct nv20_gr *gr = nv20_gr(base);
236 struct nvkm_device *device = gr->base.engine.subdev.device;
237 u32 tmp, vramsz;
238 int i;
239
240 nvkm_wr32(device, NV20_PGRAPH_CHANNEL_CTX_TABLE,
241 nvkm_memory_addr(gr->ctxtab) >> 4);
242
243 if (device->chipset == 0x20) {
244 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_INDEX, 0x003d0000);
245 for (i = 0; i < 15; i++)
246 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_DATA, 0x00000000);
247 nvkm_msec(device, 2000,
248 if (!nvkm_rd32(device, 0x400700))
249 break;
250 );
251 } else {
252 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_INDEX, 0x02c80000);
253 for (i = 0; i < 32; i++)
254 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_DATA, 0x00000000);
255 nvkm_msec(device, 2000,
256 if (!nvkm_rd32(device, 0x400700))
257 break;
258 );
259 }
260
261 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PGRAPH_INTR , 0xFFFFFFFF);
262 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PGRAPH_INTR_EN, 0xFFFFFFFF);
263
264 nvkm_wr32(device, NV04_PGRAPH_DEBUG_0, 0xFFFFFFFF);
265 nvkm_wr32(device, NV04_PGRAPH_DEBUG_0, 0x00000000);
266 nvkm_wr32(device, NV04_PGRAPH_DEBUG_1, 0x00118700);
267 nvkm_wr32(device, NV04_PGRAPH_DEBUG_3, 0xF3CE0475); /* 0x4 = auto ctx switch */
268 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_DEBUG_4, 0x00000000);
269 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x40009C , 0x00000040);
270
271 if (device->chipset >= 0x25) {
272 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x400890, 0x00a8cfff);
273 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x400610, 0x304B1FB6);
274 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x400B80, 0x1cbd3883);
275 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x400B84, 0x44000000);
276 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x400098, 0x40000080);
277 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x400B88, 0x000000ff);
278
279 } else {
280 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x400880, 0x0008c7df);
281 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x400094, 0x00000005);
282 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x400B80, 0x45eae20e);
283 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x400B84, 0x24000000);
284 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x400098, 0x00000040);
285 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_INDEX, 0x00E00038);
286 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_DATA , 0x00000030);
287 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_INDEX, 0x00E10038);
288 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_DATA , 0x00000030);
289 }
290
291 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x4009a0, nvkm_rd32(device, 0x100324));
292 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_INDEX, 0x00EA000C);
293 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_DATA, nvkm_rd32(device, 0x100324));
294
295 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_CTX_CONTROL, 0x10000100);
296 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_STATE , 0xFFFFFFFF);
297
298 tmp = nvkm_rd32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_SURFACE) & 0x0007ff00;
299 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_SURFACE, tmp);
300 tmp = nvkm_rd32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_SURFACE) | 0x00020100;
301 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_SURFACE, tmp);
302
303 /* begin RAM config */
304 vramsz = device->func->resource_size(device, 1) - 1;
305 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x4009A4, nvkm_rd32(device, 0x100200));
306 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x4009A8, nvkm_rd32(device, 0x100204));
307 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_INDEX, 0x00EA0000);
308 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_DATA , nvkm_rd32(device, 0x100200));
309 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_INDEX, 0x00EA0004);
310 nvkm_wr32(device, NV10_PGRAPH_RDI_DATA , nvkm_rd32(device, 0x100204));
311 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x400820, 0);
312 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x400824, 0);
313 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x400864, vramsz - 1);
314 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x400868, vramsz - 1);
315
316 /* interesting.. the below overwrites some of the tile setup above.. */
317 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x400B20, 0x00000000);
318 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x400B04, 0xFFFFFFFF);
319
320 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PGRAPH_ABS_UCLIP_XMIN, 0);
321 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PGRAPH_ABS_UCLIP_YMIN, 0);
322 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PGRAPH_ABS_UCLIP_XMAX, 0x7fff);
323 nvkm_wr32(device, NV03_PGRAPH_ABS_UCLIP_YMAX, 0x7fff);
324 return 0;
325}
326
327void *
328nv20_gr_dtor(struct nvkm_gr *base)
329{
330 struct nv20_gr *gr = nv20_gr(base);
331 nvkm_memory_del(&gr->ctxtab);
332 return gr;
333}
334
335int
336nv20_gr_new_(const struct nvkm_gr_func *func, struct nvkm_device *device,
337 int index, struct nvkm_gr **pgr)
338{
339 struct nv20_gr *gr;
340
341 if (!(gr = kzalloc(sizeof(*gr), GFP_KERNEL)))
342 return -ENOMEM;
343 *pgr = &gr->base;
344
345 return nvkm_gr_ctor(func, device, index, 0x00001000, true, &gr->base);
346}
347
348static const struct nvkm_gr_func
349nv20_gr = {
350 .dtor = nv20_gr_dtor,
351 .oneinit = nv20_gr_oneinit,
352 .init = nv20_gr_init,
353 .intr = nv20_gr_intr,
354 .tile = nv20_gr_tile,
355 .chan_new = nv20_gr_chan_new,
356 .sclass = {
357 { -1, -1, 0x0012, &nv04_gr_object }, /* beta1 */
358 { -1, -1, 0x0019, &nv04_gr_object }, /* clip */
359 { -1, -1, 0x0030, &nv04_gr_object }, /* null */
360 { -1, -1, 0x0039, &nv04_gr_object }, /* m2mf */
361 { -1, -1, 0x0043, &nv04_gr_object }, /* rop */
362 { -1, -1, 0x0044, &nv04_gr_object }, /* patt */
363 { -1, -1, 0x004a, &nv04_gr_object }, /* gdi */
364 { -1, -1, 0x0062, &nv04_gr_object }, /* surf2d */
365 { -1, -1, 0x0072, &nv04_gr_object }, /* beta4 */
366 { -1, -1, 0x0089, &nv04_gr_object }, /* sifm */
367 { -1, -1, 0x008a, &nv04_gr_object }, /* ifc */
368 { -1, -1, 0x0096, &nv04_gr_object }, /* celcius */
369 { -1, -1, 0x0097, &nv04_gr_object }, /* kelvin */
370 { -1, -1, 0x009e, &nv04_gr_object }, /* swzsurf */
371 { -1, -1, 0x009f, &nv04_gr_object }, /* imageblit */
372 {}
373 }
374};
375
376int
377nv20_gr_new(struct nvkm_device *device, int index, struct nvkm_gr **pgr)
378{
379 return nv20_gr_new_(&nv20_gr, device, index, pgr);
380}
